import java.util.Scanner;
public class sum2N {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		//add a new  varb
		int a;
		int b;
		int sum ;
		
		
		//
		a = 30;
		b = 60;
		//cal the total 
		sum = a+ b;
		System.out.print("The Total is "+sum);
